alert.note: Alert for Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Wind Advisory issued January 16 at 7:06PM PST until January 17 at 3:00AM PST by NWS Oxnard
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY IN EFFECT UNTIL 3 AM PST TUESDAY... * WHAT...Northwest to north winds 20 to 30 mph gusts to 45 mph, except local gusts to 55 mph near Montecito Hills. * WHERE...Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range and Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range. * WHEN...Until 3 AM PST Tuesday. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds will blow around unsecured objects and make driving difficult, especially for high profile vehicles. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.

area.areaDesc: Santa Ynez Mountains Eastern Range; Santa Ynez Mountains Western Range
